title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server that lets you pull, run, and manage GGUF models locally with a built-in Modelfile builder and REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for the Ollama server; chat, generate, embed, pull, push, list models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same generate/chat/embed API surface as the Python lib.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as LLMs and embeddings for chains, agents, RAG, etc.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Full-featured, open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama servers; supports multi-model chats, file uploads, RAG, user auth.

title: ollama-cli-copilot
summary: Rust-based CLI copilot that wraps Ollama completions to suggest shell commands and explain stderr in the terminal.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook with example notebooks for RAG, fine-tuning adapters, multimodal vision, and CI integration.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-affinity and horizontal pod autoscaling.

title: ollama-compose
summary: Docker-Compose stack bundling Ollama, WebUI, Postgres vector DB and Redis for a one-command local RAG sandbox.

title: llama-cpp-ollama
summary: Discussion thread explaining how Ollama embeds llama.cpp for fast CPU+GPU inference and how to build custom runners.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot (YouTube)
summary: Step-by-step video showing how to build a PDF-aware RAG chatbot using Ollama + LangChain + Streamlit in 20 min.

title: ollama-hackernews-discuss
summary: Hacker News discussion on Ollama’s open-source approach vs. closed SaaS LLM endpoints, performance benchmarks, and roadmap.

title: ollama-npm-search
summary: NPM registry search listing 40+ community packages: Express middleware, NestJS modules, Deno bindings, Discord bots.

title: ollama-pypi-search
summary: PyPI search showing libraries like ollama-textual, ollama-rag, ollama-gradio, and FastAPI plugins for chat endpoints.

title: ollama-models-hub
summary: Official registry of 70+ curated GGUF models (Llama 3, Phi-3, Mistral, CodeLlama, Gemma) with pre-configured Modelfiles.

title: ollama-vscode
summary: VS Code extension that adds a chat sidebar and inline code completion powered by any local Ollama model.

title: ollama-ray
summary: Ray Serve integration for autoscaling Ollama deployments across GPU workers with batching and zero-downtime updates.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Python Discord bot that streams Ollama completions into threads, supports slash commands and per-user model quotas.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community-maintained Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger CI module that caches and serves Ollama models inside pipelines for reproducible LLM-based testing steps.
